sn6.5:3.1: 5. Aññatarabrahmasutta
sn6.5:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti:
sn6.5:4.3: “natthi so samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yo idha āgaccheyyā”ti.
sn6.5:4.4: Atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—
sn6.5:4.7: Atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno upari vehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā.
sn6.5:5.3: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno upari vehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ.
sn6.5:5.5: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
sn6.5:5.8: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno puratthimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno upari vehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
sn6.5:6.3: Addasā kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā … pe …
sn6.5:6.8: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno upari vehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
sn6.5:7.3: Addasā kho āyasmā mahākappino bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā … pe …
sn6.5:7.9: Atha kho āyasmā mahākappino pacchimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno upari vehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
sn6.5:8.8: Atha kho āyasmā anuruddho uttaraṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno upari vehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.
sn6.5:9.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn6.5:12.1: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ brahmānaṃ saṃvejetvā—
sn6.5:12.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
sn6.5:12.5: Atha kho so brahmā aññataraṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ āmantesi:
sn6.5:12.8: ‘atthi nu kho, mārisa moggallāna, aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā;
sn6.5:12.9: seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno kassapo kappino anuruddho’”ti?
sn6.5:12.10: “Evaṃ, mārisā”ti kho so brahmapārisajjo tassa brahmuno paṭissutvā yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn6.5:12.12: “atthi nu kho, mārisa moggallāna, aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā;
sn6.5:12.13: seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno kassapo kappino anuruddho”ti?
sn6.5:12.14: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn6.5:14.1: Atha kho so brahmapārisajjo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā yena so brahmā tenupasaṅkami;
sn6.5:16.2: Attamano ca so brahmā tassa brahmapārisajjassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
